item.title: Networks
item.description: We are currently present on the following networks: Polkadot Our validator, Astrocyte, is up and running: subscan polkastats Kusama Our validator, Astrocyte, is up and running: subscan polkastats

item.title: Our name
item.description: We named ourselves after neuroglial cells, which are responsible for supporting and protecting neural cells across the nervous system. Without their support, the billion-node decentralized network of neurons that drives all information processing in the central and peripheral nervous system could not exist.
